channel.title: Leadership endorsement on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership endorsement on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:83 Chances: Walt Disney Co. is entering into a joint venture with Reliance Industries and Star India, indicating potential growth in the Indian market. Endorsement of Disney CEO Bob Iger by JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon suggests confidence in the company’s leadership. Trian Fund Management’s proxy fight with Disney could lead to significant changes in the board and potentially impact the company’s direction.
